title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Interview Descriptions: Very straightforward. Getting a call back for an interview took a while. I had to pursue the results of my application more than once. Overall an okay experience though. Would definitely recommend that you follow up with them after applying
Interview Questions: What are your strengths that would benefit our facility?

title: Registration Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Forrest Health
Interview Descriptions: The lady who interviewed me was very professional and nice! Great interview experience, nice staff who are easy to get along with.  Would highly recommend Forrest Health to anyone and everyone.
Interview Questions: They asked me about my work experience and how I thought i would thrive in that environment if i were to get the position.

title: Clinical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Forrest Health
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is not difficult at all. If your background check comes back great you’ll get the job. I made sure my resume looked nice and that I listed my experience.
Interview Questions: They asked about previous experiences and how I would react in different scenarios.

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Forrest Health (New York, NY) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Wonderful and eye contacting. Everything was short sweet and pencil. Very well dressed and groomed. The office was clean and everyone was extremely friendly and made you feel welcomed. I think I did very good
Interview Questions: What qualifies you for the job

title: Patient Sitter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Forrest Health (Hattiesburg, MS) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was laid back, interviewer was late for a zoom interview. I feel like she was not having a good day. Overall, she didn’t show much interest. I think I did pretty good. Waiting on a call back
Interview Questions: Name a time I had to deal with a difficult customer who has not been pleased with the service.

title: Trauma/ER RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Forrest Health (Hattiesburg, MS) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: In my experience, I was contacted by someone in HR. They set up a basic interview with me and I did a background check at that time. The interview was more about getting to know me and what I would bring to the organization as a whole. Once I completed that interview, I was brought to meet the ER manager (as that was the department in which I was interviewing for) and she asked me a lot of the same questions, but with more nurse/health care focused questions.
Interview Questions: What made you choose the ER?

title: Paser-Registration Interview
Interview Descriptions: I applied on the website then got call a week later to set up the interview. I had a mini interview with HR, then a second one with the manager of my department. A week later I was offered the position.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Forrest Health (Hattiesburg, MS) in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions: Regular interview, nothing special. If you have a license, you are hired. They are very nice and accommodating. Do not wear scrubs. Overall, it’s an easy process. You go in for the initial HR interview and they you are scheduled to interview with the manager of your department.
Interview Questions: Explain a time when you went above and beyond for a patient?

title: Cook Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Forrest Health (Hattiesburg, MS) in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: I went to first interview lady was very nice asked questions was told to be at second interview on Monday meet with manager she was very nice now waiting on background check to come back
Interview Questions: Why do u feel u are qualified for the field I applied for

title: Record Scanning Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Forrest Health
Interview Descriptions: Interview with HR, interview with supervisor, questions asked about what you will bring to the team, what you know of the field, questions asked about certain situations if happened to you

title: Network Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Forrest Health (Hattiesburg, MS) in May 2012
Interview Descriptions: Calm and good process. Great people
Interview Questions: Describe all the OS you have worked on
